DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety and efficacy of albiglutide in subjects with type 2 diabetes
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Determine the Safety and Efficacy of Albiglutide in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: type 2 diabetes BMI 2045kg/m2 inclusive females who are pregnant, lactating, or less than 6 weeks postpartum current symptomatic heart failure (NYHA Class IIIV)
